dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1309 RH: TSA Administrator Modernization Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Katko (for himself, Mr. McCaul, Mr. Keating, and Mr. King of New York) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security
Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed

form.official-title: To streamline the office and term of the Administrator of the Transportation Security Administration, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the TSA Administrator Modernization Act of 2017.

section.header: Amendments to the Homeland Security Act of 2002 and title 5, United States Code

subsection.text: Paragraph (1) of section 103(a) of the Homeland Security Act of 2002 is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (I), by striking 12 and inserting 11; and
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: An Administrator of the Transportation Security Administration, in accordance with section 114 of title 49, United States Code.

subsection.text: Section 5315 of title 5, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

quoted-block.quoted-block-continuation-text: Administrator of the Transportation Security Administration, Department of Homeland Security.

section.header: Amendments to title 49, United States Code
section.text: Section 114 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by striking Department of Transportation and inserting Department of Homeland Security;
in subsection (b)(1), by striking Under Secretary of Transportation for Security and inserting Administrator of the Transportation Security Administration;
by striking Under Secretary each place it appears and inserting Administrator;
in subsection (b), in the heading, by striking Under Secretary and inserting Administrator;
in subsection (e)(4), by striking Secretary of Transportation and inserting Secretary of Homeland Security;

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (6), by striking Federal Security Managers and inserting Federal Security Directors; and
in paragraph (14), by inserting air carriers or before foreign air carriers;
by striking the Secretary each place it appears and inserting the Secretary of Homeland Security; and
in paragraph (3), by striking The Secretary and inserting The Secretary of Homeland Security;

paragraph.text: in subsection (j)(1)(D), by striking the Secretary and inserting the Secretary of Homeland Security;

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (2)(A), by striking the Secretary and inserting the Secretary of Homeland Security; and
in paragraph (4)(B), by striking the Administrator under subparagraph (A) and inserting the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration under subparagraph (A);
in the heading, by striking Under Secretary and inserting Administrator; and
in paragraph (1), in the heading, by striking Under Secretary and inserting Administrator;

paragraph.text: in subsection (n), by striking Department of Transportation and inserting Department of Homeland Security;
in subsection (o), by striking Department of Transportation and inserting Department of Homeland Security; and
in subsection (p)(4), by striking Secretary of Transportation and inserting Secretary of Homeland Security.

endorsement.action-desc: Committed to the Committee of the Whole House on the State of the Union and ordered to be printed
